item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-07-19
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Popovers on the Square (8 Congress St, Portsmouth) w/ 4 others. #
  • I'm at Prescott Park (Marcy St, at Atkinson St, Portsmouth) w/ 2 others. #
  • Roberts Maine Grille #
  • I'm at Robert's Maine Grill (326 US Route 1, Kittery). #
  • Lobster-tastic! #
  • I'm at Starbucks (1154 Boylston St, Hammond St, Chestnut Hill) w/ 2 others. #
  • I'm at Boloco Cleveland Circle (1940 Beacon Street, Sutherland Rd, Boston). #
  • I'm at Starbucks Newport (Thames, Mill, Newport) w/ 2 others. #
